text:
@piersmorgan @KimSussex3 .@piersmorgan
#DominicCummings & @MaryWakefield
could have turned to the ‘Islington COVID-19
Mutual Aid Group’ for help with childcare
fears, when struck down so badly with
Coronavirus. Did @BorisJohnson bother
to ask #DominicCummings why they
did not ‘stay at home’ as required!
